title: Alexeieff's commercials
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Animation (Cinematography)
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Advertising
abstract: Fumees--Divertissment--Automation--Les Rimes--Pure Beaute--La Seve de la terre
description: A collection of advertising films made by French lithographer and animator, Alexander Alexeieff, some using his own 'pinboard' device, and others more conventional methods of animation. The reel includes: Fumees - which took a year to make on the pinboard and lasts barely a minute, with the smoke made from hundreds of fine oscillating lines superimposed densely on each frame, and Le seve de la terre - with delicately animated glass beads to represent drops of oil.
